author: tetsuya
msg: Pluto	Pluto is the Reference Implementation of the Java Portlet Specfication (JSR 168).
JaxMe	JaxMe 2 is an open source implementation of JAXB, the specification for Java/XML binding.
wsrp4j	The OASIS Web Services for Remote Portlets (WSRP) standard simplifies integration of remote applications/content into portals.
